body:
So this month was horrible for me ( on Avicus ofc ) I got tempbanned for 1 month of exccesive infractions,  I made The largest appeal on Avicus history But I only got 1 of The 2 infractions I needed to be unbanned so.... rip :'c
But Now Im unbanned so...
  A sk

:)
